overview:
Carey is a general manager with broad experience in the mobile internet market space. A strategic thinker, he is an experienced leader in managing innovation, and directing the product roadmap. Methodical and rigorous approach to all aspects of business. Expertise in the agile delivery of products to market. Implementation of incremental, continuous improvement, and the development of cross-organizational processes and metrics.

Specialties: New Media, particularly for the mobile Internet. Mobile e-commerce, advertising, and location-based services.

Currently General Manager of Online and Mobile at European Directories
